EnableAssessment.title: Enable Gatekeeper
EnableAssessment.description: If the key is present and has a value of YES, Gatekeeper is enabled. If the key is present and has a value of NO, Gatekeeper is disabled.

AllowIdentifiedDevelopers.title: Allow Identified Developers
AllowIdentifiedDevelopers.description: If the key is present and has a value of YES, Gatekeeper's "Mac App Store and identified developers” option is chosen. If the key is present and has a value of NO, Gatekeeper's "Mac App Store” option is chosen. If EnableAssessment is not true, this key has no effect.
